name: ms_filing_facts
description: This dataset contains financial records of Morgan Stanley, detailing accounts payable and other financial facts over various fiscal periods. It includes data on the company's financial state, reported in USD, across different fiscal years and quarters.

fields.fieldDescription: Unique identifier for each record in the dataset
Central Index Key (CIK) number identifying each filer on EDGAR (the SEC's Electronic Data Gathering, Analysis, and Retrieval system)
Name of the entity, in this case consistently Morgan Stanley
Descriptive label for the financial fact reported
The date when the reported period ends
The financial value reported for the given fact
The unique SEC accession number for the associated filing
Fiscal year in which the record falls
The specific period of the filing, such as Q1, Q2, Q3, FY (Full Year)
Type of SEC filing form, e.g., 10-Q, 10-K
The date on which the filing was made
The unit of measurement for financial values, typically USD
